dict.string: A game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.
Numbers are said to be in descending order when they are arranged from the largest to the smallest number. Exemple: Numbers 3, 2 and 1 are arranged in descending order.
The rod in the far left side.
The number of rods and stack disk size of the Tower of Hanoi.
Code that tells an application to perform a specific action.
